p: The probability of an outpatient visit per influenza case was estimated from the total number of cases in Primary Care visits (International Classification of Primary Care, Second edition code: R80 influenza) [ 52] and the total population in Spain [ 35], between 2011 and 2014. An equal probability was assumed for NHR and HR patients due to the lack of a reliable Spanish source. For children, outpatient visits were further divided between uncomplicated and complicated cases, which were defined as cases that present otitis media [ 42] and pneumonia or other complications [ 43].
